When you do work in a virtual production,
translation.ja: バーチャルプロダクションでは

translation.en: you have to create content beforehand.
translation.ja: コンテンツを事前に作る必要がある

translation.en: You're kind of pulling postproduction up front before shooting.
translation.ja: ポストプロダクションを撮影前に行う感じね

translation.en: It was new for everyone on both sides, on our traditional filmmaker side,
translation.ja: 我々 映像作家だけでなく全ての背景を作る―

translation.en: but also on the side of the guys who are actually doing all the backgrounds, Framestore from London.
translation.ja: フレームストア社にとっても初めての経験だった

translation.en: [man] We started this when there was no script.
translation.ja: 作業を始めた時は

translation.en: visual effects, before we film,

translation.en: The Volume itself, it's logistically challenging.
translation.ja: ボリュームは複雑で大変だ

translation.ja: 準備に時間を要するし

translation.en: because they were used to receiving production designs, and just translating them.

translation.en: In this case, for 1899, we were developing them from scratch with him.

translation.en: It's a lot of fun to do it and see so many people, um, being on it.
